name: Adobe Systems Benelux bv
goal: Adobe is the global leader in digital marketing and digital media solutions. Our tools and services allow our customers to create groundbreaking digital content, deploy it across media and devices, measure and optimize it over time, and achieve greater business success. We help our customers make, manage, measure, and monetize their content across every channel and screen.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation, Youth
